```{r}

#Tabela 1

tabela1 <- battles %>%
  group_by(attacker_king) %>% 
  summarise(name = n()) %>% 
  mutate(rel.freq = paste0(round(100 * name/sum(name), 0), "%"))
 

  
tabela1


tabela2 <-  battles %>%
   group_by(attacker_king, attacker_outcome) %>% 
  summarise(name = n()) %>% 
  na.omit()
 
tabela2.1 <- tabela2 %>%  
  spread(key = attacker_outcome, value = name)

tabela2.1 <- tabela2.1 %>% 
  mutate(loss = replace_na(loss,0))

tabela2.1


```
